info.title: CareLinc Backend API
info.description: Outlines the different endpoints contained in the CareLinc Back-End API. These API Endpoints handle the management of accounts, appointment bookings, inventory management and other operations that are crucial to the functioning of the CareLinc platform.

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: Endpoints related to authentication and authorisation operations (login, create account, etc)

tags.name: Pay-it-Forward
tags.description: Endpoints related to the Pay-it-Forward program, allowing patients, doctors and companies to manage requests for help

tags.name: Inventory
tags.description: Endpoints related to drug inventory management

tags.name: Appointments
tags.description: Endpoints related to appointment scheduling and availability

tags.name: Chatbot
tags.description: Endpoints related to chatbot operations, allowing patients to interact with the chatbot

tags.name: Mail
tags.description: Endpoints related to mail operations which sends patients a payment confirmation email

BearerAuth.name: Authorization
BearerAuth.description: Enter your bearer token in the format **Bearer <token>**

post.description: This route allows the creation of a new company account.

get.description: This route retrieves the details of a company by its ID.
This route fetches all drug request orders.
This route retrieves a specific drug request by appointment ID, drug name, and company ID.

put.description: This route updates the status of a drug request from completed back to pending.
This route updates a drug request to completed and deducts the necessary medicine from the inventory.

post.description: This route adds the contributed drug request to a contribution list (drug orders).

get.description: This route retrieves all drug orders that the company is contributing to.

put.description: This route confirms that a drug order is completed.

delete.description: This route deletes a drug order from the contribution list and puts it back to the pending request list.

put.description: This route returns the medicine contributed back to the inventory for a drug order that was canceled and put back into the pending request list.

get.description: This route retrieves a list of available drugs in the system.
This route retrieves the details of a drug in the company's inventory by the drug name.

delete.description: This route removes all available drugs remaining inside the company inventory and updates the record.

post.description: This route adds more drug quantity into the company inventory for a selected drug.

delete.description: This route removes a specified drug quantity based on user input from the company inventory.

get.description: This route retrieves all available drug records (drugs added into the company's inventory logs) that belong to the company.

put.description: This route removes all remaining drugs for the specified drug record.

delete.description: This route deletes the drug record from the database.
